column2: "Israelhen Joahaz ne ba Jehoas n’afe a otsia ebien no mu nna Amazia
column3: Judahen Joas ne ba no

column2: "Aber a ɔhyɛɛ ase dzii hen no nna oedzi mfe eduonu enum; na odzii hen mfe eduonu akron wɔ Jerusalɛm: na ne na ne dzin dze Jehoadin a ofi Jerusalɛm."
"Na ɔyɛɛ dza ɔtsen wɔ EWURADZE enyiwa do
column3: naaso ɔnntse dɛ n’egya David: ɔyɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ n’egya Joas yɛe no nyinara."

column2: "Naaso mbea sorɔnsorɔm no dze
column3: woennyiyi no hɔ: ɔman no kɔr do bɔɔ afɔr na wɔhyeew eduhuam wɔ mbea sorɔnsorɔm no do."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: ntsɛmara a ahendzi no tsintsimii wɔ ne nsamu ara
column4: nna okunkum no nkowaa a wokum n’egya ɔhen no:"

column2: "na ewudzifo no hɔn mba no dze oennku hɔn: dɛ mbrɛ dza wɔakyerɛw no wɔ Moses ne mbra nwoma a EWURADZE hyɛe no mu dɛ
column3: Mma wonnku egyanom wɔ mba ntsi
column4: nkyii so mma wonnku mba wɔ egyanom ntsi; na mbom nyimpa biara bowu wɔ nankasa no bɔn ntsi."

column2: "Afei Amazia kum Edom mu mpemdu wɔ Nkyen Bɔnsa no mu
column3: na ɔnam akodzi do gyee Sela

column2: "Nna Amazia somaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr Jehu ba Jehoahaz ne ba
column3: Jehoas

column2: "Na Israelhen Jehoas somae ma wɔkɔr Judahen Amazia nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column4: Kɔkrɔnsoɛ a ɔwɔ Lebanon do no somae ma wɔkɔr nkyindur a ɔwɔ Lebanon do no nkyɛn
column6: Fa wo babaa ma me babanyin ayewar: na abowa bɔyafo bi a ɔwɔ Lebanon do botwaa mu
column7: na otsiatsiaa kɔkrɔnsoɛ no do sɛɛe no."

column2: "Ampa etum eku Edom
column3: ma ntsi ayɛ ahomemado: fa tuw
column4: na tsena fie; na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na edze woho bɛgyegye ɔhaw mu ama mbusu aba wo do

column2: "Naaso Amazia enntsie. Nna Israelhen Jehoas sii mu kɔree; na ɔno na Judahen Amazia dzii ako wɔ Bɛt-semes a ɔyɛ Juda dze no."
"Na Juda dzii nkogu wɔ Israel enyim; na woguanguanee
column3: nyimpa biara kɔr n’asesee mu."

column2: "Na Israelhen Jehoas kyeer Judahen Amazia
column3: Ahazia ba Joas ne ba no
column5: na ɔbaa Jerusalɛm bobubuu Jerusalɛm fasu no fi Efraim kuropon ho dze kodur kutuwdo kuropon no ho

column2: "Na ɔfaa sika na dwetɛ nyinara
column3: na ndzɛmbandzɛmba a wohun no wɔ EWURADZE ne fie
column4: na ɔhen no ne fie akoradze mu no nyinara

column2: "Afei Jehoas ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: dza ɔyɛe
column5: na mbrɛ osii na ɔnye Judahen Amazia koe no
column6: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na Jehoas kɔr ne nsamankyir
column3: na wosiee no wɔ Samaria kaa Israel ahemfo no ho; na ne babanyin Jeroboam dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."

column2: "Israelhen Jehoas
column3: Jehoahaz ne ba no
column5: Judahen Amazia a ɔyɛ Joas ne ba no

column2: "Afei Amazia no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Juda ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na wɔpaam ne tsir do wɔ Jerusalɛm; na oguanee kɔr Lakis: na wɔsomae ma wotsiiw no kɔr Lakis
column3: na wokokum no wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na wɔdze no too mpɔnkɔ do bae: na wosiee no wɔ Jerusalɛm kaa n’egyanom ho wɔ David kurow mu."
"Na Juda ɔman no nyinara faa Azaria a oedzi mfe duesia no
column3: na wɔhyɛɛ no hen wɔ n’egya Amazia n’ananmu."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔkyekyeer Elat
column3: na ɔdanee maa Juda
column4: ber a nna n’egya ɔhen no kɔ ne nsamankyir no."

column2: "Judahen Amazia
column3: Joas ba no
column4: n’afe a otsia duenum no mu no nna Joas ne ba Jeroboam Israelhen no hyɛɛ ase dzii hen wɔ Samaria
column5: na odzii hen mfe eduanan biako."

column2: "Na ɔyɛɛ dza omuo wɔ EWURADZE enyi do: oemmfi Nebat ne ba Jeroboam no bɔn a ɔdze maa Israel fomee no nyinara ho."
"Ɔno na ɔkoe gyee Israel nsaase a ofi Hamat ahɛnee dze bodu Araba mpoano a ofii hɔn nsa no sanee bae
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE Israel Nyankopɔn
column6: nkɔnhyɛnyi a ofi Gath-hefer do kae no tse."

column2: "Na EWURADZE hun Israel n’ahohiahia
column3: dɛ ɔyɛ wen dodow: osiandɛ obiara nnyi hɔ
column4: dɛ ɔdze ho anaa ɔnndze no a ɔbɔboa Israel."

column2: "Naaso EWURADZE annka dɛ ɔbɛpepa Israel ne dzin efi asaase do: ntsi ɔdze nam Joas ne ba Jeroboam n’abaw do gyee hɔn nkwa."
"Afei Jeroboam no ho nsɛm nkaa no
column3: na dza ɔyɛe nyinara
column7: na Hamat a ɔyɛ Juda dze no sanee maa Israel no
column8: ana wɔnnkyerɛɛw no wɔ Israel ahemfo hɔn Mbermunsɛm nwoma no mu?"

column2: "Na Jeroboam kɔr ne nsamankyir kɛkaa n’egyanom Israel
column3: ahemfo no ho; na ne babanyin Zekaria dzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."
